sn22.35:1.2: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.35:1.3: “sadhu me, bhante, bhagava sankhittena dhammam desetu;
sn22.35:1.4: yamaham bhagavato dhammam sutva eko vupakattho, appamatto atapi pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn22.35:1.5: “Yam kho, bhikkhu, anuseti, tena sankham gacchati;
sn22.35:1.6: yam nanuseti, na tena sankham gacchati”ti.
sn22.35:2.1: “Yatha katham pana tvam, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanasi”ti?
sn22.35:2.5: Sankhare ce anuseti tena sankham gacchati.
sn22.35:2.7: Rupance, bhante, nanuseti na tena sankham gacchati.
sn22.35:2.11: vinnanance nanuseti na tena sankham gacchati.
sn22.35:2.12: Imassa khvaham, bhante, bhagavata sankhittena bhasitassa evam vittharena attham ajanami”ti.
sn22.35:3.2: Sadhu kho tvam, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena bhasitassa vittharena attham ajanasi.
sn22.35:3.3: Rupance, bhikkhu, anuseti tena sankham gacchati.
sn22.35:3.8: Rupance, bhikkhu, nanuseti na tena sankham gacchati.
sn22.35:3.12: vinnanance nanuseti na tena sankham gacchati.
sn22.35:3.13: Imassa kho, bhikkhu, maya sankhittena, bhasitassa evam vittharena attho datthabbo”ti.
sn22.35:4.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinanditva anumoditva utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
sn22.35:5.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu eko vupakattho appamatto atapi pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthaya kulaputta sammadeva agarasma anagariyam pabbajanti, tadanuttaram—brahmacariyapariyosanam dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja vihasi.
sn22.35:5.2: “Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya”ti abbhannasi.
sn22.35:5.3: Annataro ca pana so bhikkhu arahatam ahositi.
